title: Stellar Stream
description: Stellar Stream is Ayumu Uehara's song for the mini album that was released on September 25, 2024. It is also an insert song in Nijigasaki High School Idol Club The Movie: Final Chapter Part 1.

infobox.Label: Lantis
infobox.Image: Nijigasaki Doko ni Itemo Kimi wa Kimi -Ayumu Uehara Version-.jpg
